dict.acceptation: 块，片，段；部分，部件；文章，音乐作品；

sent.orig: Cover CD cent to be an introduction originally piece, application piece with knowledge piece 3 parts.
sent.trans: 本套光盘分为入门篇、应用篇和知识篇三部分。

sent.orig: Arrive home, strong wife says " piece look, piece look, what did I take? "
sent.trans: 一到家，就冲老婆说“块看、块看，我拿来了什么？”

sent.orig: Tomorrow, we'll start breaking picture down piece by piece, starting with the living expenses.
sent.trans: 明天，我们将从生活开销开始，分开来详细介绍。

sent.orig: I bought this piece of spring festival picture home. The pictures are sold at per piece.
sent.trans: 我把这一张年画买回家了。年画的价钱是每张9元。

sent.orig: Insteadshe took her time to count all the money piece by piece.
sent.trans: 反而，她花费更多的时间一个接一个数这些钱。
